mapper.select: select d.owner, d.object_name, d.object_type from dba_objects d where object_id = #{objectID}

select d.referenced_name, d.referenced_owner, case d.referenced_type when 'PACKAGE BODY' then 'PACKAGE' else referenced_type end referenced_type from dba_dependencies d where d.name = #{objectName} and d.owner = #{owner} and d.type = (case #{objectType} when 'PACKAGE' then 'PACKAGE BODY' else #{objectType} end) and d.referenced_owner not in ('SYS', 'PUBLIC') and not (d.referenced_name = d.name and d.owner = d.referenced_owner and d.type = (case d.referenced_type when 'PACKAGE' then 'PACKAGE BODY' else referenced_type end) )
select d.owner "owner", d.synonym_name "objectName", 'SYNONYM' "objectType" from dba_synonyms d where 1 = 1 AND D.TABLE_OWNER = #{owner} AND D.TABLE_name = #{objectName}
